name: Balls...
description:
BALLS...

If you have a break or you are bored or just want to develop your intellectual abilities. Don't worry, make your free time interesting, exciting and usuful with this powerful puzzle game. You just need to set the right trajectory with the help of angular triangles and rectangles, with the help of the teleporter the game takes a new level of difficulty. Trajectory matching is going to be a little tricky, you need to use your mind to get the ball to the finish line and become an expert permutation puzzle player.
Features of Permutation Puzzle:
- small quantity of advertisements
- the game has 100 exciting levels
- unique levels
- several levels of very difficult puzzles
- best offline puzzle game
- smooth touch
- simple and convenient interface
- a large number of unique "Easter eggs"
